txt.en: The King's crown is an imperfect fit. One of the King's knights is like a dog to its master, loyal to fault but nothing more than a pawn. The Queen is meticulous and malicious. She gathers notes from the ledgers. The second of the King's knights is full of malice. The male chariot is genuine, by my accounting and ken - one of the people. The golden m√ªmak recently returned from a trip abroad with a laden ship. Our eyes are blind. The female chariot measures her moves and acts with intent. There is something there. I require assistants.
